page.title: 09HOBBIES
page.content: for 'Gulpman' and 'Jumping Jacks', having nearly finished them and Chris holds them for 'Daley Thompson's Decathlon' and 'Breakout'. The others? They change so frequently - Chris getting a new record and me beating it and vice versa - that no one really knows. If I'm exhausted or cross and I need something fun, calming and energetic, I bag the family tape recorder, collect my favourite tapes and take them upstairs, generally with a slice of cake on top. Now the roses are out I'm going to candy some petals and put them on the next cake with some sugared violets, shut my door, plug it in and go crazy for about half an hour, finally returning downstairs ready for anything, even going out whule the rain pours down to bring in the Basil in case lightning strikes. By Charlotte Edwards
